We specialize in offering diverse housing formats that cater to various family sizes and lifestyle requirements, ensuring you find the perfect rental house that feels like home. Our portfolio includes newly constructed builder floors, established independent bungalows, and modern fully furnished apartments.

Understanding the nuances of the rental landscape here is key. Whether you require a compact, highly efficient space close to the metro or a sprawling villa perfect for entertaining, our listings provide detailed specifications and high-quality visuals. Discover the ideal configuration for your next upscale residence along this prestigious corridor.

features.title: Independent Studio and Serviced Apartments
features.description: Ideal for single professionals or frequent travelers seeking maximum convenience and zero maintenance. These rental units offer modern amenities, often including housekeeping and security services, located strategically close to corporate offices on Golf Course Road and MG Road. Renting these spaces ensures privacy and a premium lock-and-leave lifestyle.

features.description: These are among the most popular rental choices, providing the spaciousness of a house combined with modern fittings and dedicated parking. Finding a quality 3 BHK rental house in Golf Course Road means securing a home in a low-density residential pocket with easy access to high-street retail and gourmet dining options nearby.

features.description: Perfect for larger families or those requiring home office space, 4 BHK houses offer generous living areas and multiple bathrooms. Many of these rental properties are located in gated societies or as independent builder floors in quieter blocks, providing enhanced security and a sense of community while remaining centrally located.

features.title: Spacious 5 BHK Villas and Bungalows
features.description: For those seeking the ultimate luxury rental experience, 5 BHK independent houses and villas offer expansive living quarters, often featuring private gardens, dedicated staff accommodation, and high-end finishings. Renting these executive homes provides an unmatched level of prestige and space on the Golf Course Road stretch.

features.title: Duplex Houses on Golf Course Road
features.description: Duplex rentals provide a unique vertical living experience, often featuring double-height ceilings and separate levels for formal and informal living. This format is popular among renters who value architectural uniqueness and distinct zones within their home, offering a modern twist on the traditional independent house layout.

These rare rental properties are characterized by bespoke interiors, high-end appliance packages, and often access to premium society amenities, representing the pinnacle of luxury apartment living along the Golf Course Road alignment.

faqSection.title: Essential Questions About Renting a Luxury House in Golf Course Road
faqSection.description: Get answers to the most common queries regarding lease terms, security deposits, maintenance obligations, and available property types along the prestigious Golf Course Road corridor.

faqs.question: What is the typical lease duration for houses rented on Golf Course Road
faqs.answer: The standard rental agreement for premium properties, including independent houses and high-end builder floors on Golf Course Road, is usually 11 months, which is renewable. For high-net-worth individuals or corporate leases, two-year contracts are also common, often including a provision for a locked-in period. We always ensure lease terms are clearly defined and mutually beneficial before signing.

faqs.question: How much security deposit is required for a rental house in this area
faqs.answer: Due to the high value of properties and furnishings in this upscale location, the standard security deposit often ranges from three to six months' rent. This deposit is refundable upon the satisfactory handover of the property at the end of the tenancy, subject to deductions for damages beyond normal wear and tear. Specific amounts depend on whether the house is furnished or unfurnished.

faqs.question: Are pet-friendly rental houses available on Golf Course Road Gurgaon
faqs.answer: While many luxury societies and independent landlords have strict pet policies, there are certainly pet-friendly rental houses available. Finding them requires specialized searching. We filter our listings specifically for properties that welcome pets, but be prepared for potential variations in the security deposit or the requirement for a specific pet agreement rider.

faqs.question: What are the common maintenance responsibilities for the tenant versus the landlord
faqs.answer: Generally, the landlord is responsible for structural repairs, major plumbing and electrical issues, and external paintwork. The tenant is typically responsible for day-to-day maintenance, minor wear and tear repairs, and maintaining the internal state of the house, including appliances provided by the landlord. This is always detailed precisely within the rental agreement clauses.

faqs.question: Is parking included when I rent an independent house or floor on Golf Course Road
faqs.answer: Yes, parking is almost always included, especially with builder floors and independent houses in this area. Most premium rental properties offer dedicated covered parking spaces, often one or two spots per unit. We verify the exact parking allocation for every rental house we list to ensure adequate space for your vehicles.

faqs.question: What is the average rent range for a 4 BHK luxury floor in this prime location
faqs.answer: The rental price for a 4 BHK luxury builder floor on Golf Course Road can vary widely based on the exact sector, proximity to the main road, age of construction, and level of furnishing. Generally, prices start from around INR 70,000 per month for older units and can exceed INR 2,00,000 per month for brand-new, fully serviced premium residences. Contact us for current market rates.

faqs.question: Are the rental houses usually furnished or unfurnished in this luxury segment
faqs.answer: Golf Course Road offers a mix of options. Many builder floors are available in a semi-furnished state, including modular kitchens and wardrobes. However, the demand for fully furnished, high-end rental houses is significant, especially for expatriates and corporate tenants. We clearly specify the furnishing status and inventory list for every property in our listings.

faqs.question: How long does the process take to finalize renting a house on Golf Course Road
faqs.answer: Once you have selected a property, the finalization process usually takes between 5 to 10 working days. This includes background checks, negotiation of terms, payment of the security deposit, drafting and signing of the lease agreement, and inventory verification. Our goal is to streamline this to ensure quick occupancy.

faqs.question: What added expenses should I budget for besides the monthly rent
faqs.answer: Renters should budget for utilities such as electricity, water, and gas, which are typically paid by the tenant. Additionally, if the house is within a gated community, society maintenance charges may apply. Brokerage fees, typically one month's rent plus GST, are also due upon securing the property.

faqs.question: Is Golf Course Road considered safe for families seeking rental accommodation
faqs.answer: Golf Course Road is highly regarded as one of Gurgaon's safest and most secure residential areas. The area features round-the-clock patrolling, excellent street lighting, and most luxury rental houses are located within compounds or builder floors with dedicated security personnel and CCTV surveillance, ensuring a safe environment for residents.
